subject: Dearest one in the Lord
body:
Dearest one in the Lord
It is my pleasure to write to you after considering your profile. My
name is Mrs. Elizabeth J. GLIBERT is a nationality of the United
States of America. I am married to MR.GLIBERT ANTHONY who worked with
Kuwait Petroleum Corporation in the United Kingdom for nine years
before he died in the year 2014. We were married for eleven years
without a child; he died after a brief illness that lasted for only
four days. Before his death we were both born again Christians.
When my late husband was alive we deposited the sum of $18.5 million
(Eighteen Million Five Hundred Thousand U.S. Dollars) with a BANK in
Europe Presently, this money is still with the BANK. Recently, my
Doctor told me that I would not last for the next one or two months
due to a long term cancer problem. Though what disturbs me most is my
stroke. Having known my condition I decided to donate this fund to
church or better still a Christian individual that will utilize this
money the way I am going to instruct herein. I want you to use this
fund for churches, orphanages, Research centers and widows propagating
to the word of God and to ensure that the house of God is maintained.
The Bible made us understand that blessed is the hand that gives. I
took this bold decision because I don’t have any child that will
inherit this money and my husband’s relatives are not Christians and I
don’t want my family's hard earned money to be misused by unbelievers.
I don’t want a situation where this money will be used in an ungodly
manner. Hence the reason for taking this bold decision.
I am not afraid of death hence I know where I am going. I know that I
am going to be in the bosom of the Lord. Exodus 14 VS 14 says that the
lord will fight my case and I shall hold my peace. With God all things
are possible. As soon as I receive your reply I shall detail you more
and I will give the contact of the BANK as soon as I am sure that you
will do the will of God. I will also issue you a letter of authority
that will empower you as the new beneficiary of this Fund. I want you
to always pray for me because the lord is my Shepherd. My happiness is
that I lived the life of a worthy Christian.
Whoever that wants to serve the Lord must serve him in spirit and
truth. Please always be prayerful all through your life. Any delay in
your reply will give me room in sourcing for a church or Christian
individual for this same purpose. Please assure me that you will act
accordingly as I stated here.
Hoping to hear from you soon!
Remain blessed in the name of the Lord.
Yours-in-Christ,
Mrs. Elizabeth J ANTHONY.
Email; (
mrssisterelizabethjohnsonmrssi@gmail.com
)

subject: Re:    Dearest one in the Lord
body:
Hello Mrs. Elizabeth Anthony,

I am deeply moved by your story and your strong faith in the Lord. It's truly inspiring to see such dedication and commitment to doing good, even in the face of adversity. I'm sorry to hear about your health condition and I will certainly keep you in my prayers.

Your intention to use this fund for churches, research centers, and widows is commendable. It's a noble cause that aligns with the teachings of our faith. However, I would like to know more about how you envision this process unfolding.

Could you please provide more details on how you plan to distribute these funds? Are there specific organizations or churches that you have in mind? Also, could you tell me more about the bank where the money is currently held?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Hal

subject: Re: Dearest one in the Lord
body:
Dear beloved one in Christ,

Thank you very much for your quick response. Well, I really understood your
email, But i want you to consider me in regards to this
transaction as I don't know how long I will last again.  I was very happy
when I received your mail. I have made up my mind to give out my fund for
the work of God as a ransom seed for my soul. If that is the only thing I
will do to receive my healing, I have to do it. If that is the only thing I
will do to make heaven when I die, please, I  have to do it. My prayer is
that when the fund gets to you, let God give you the wisdom to utilize it
for things that will glorify his holy name.

Please, help me in prayers, I don't want to die, I want to live and declare
the glory of God upon my life. I know that I will definitely come out of
this sickness because I have faith. My faith is based on Job's experience,
people thought that Job would die, he lost everything he had but he
believed in God and finally he was restored.

I am giving everything out for the name of my God to be glorified. I want
you to help me in distributing this fund to the orphanage homes and the
needy.

Like you have asked, I don't have any particular Orphanage in mind,but I
believe you are a christian , and will distribute the funds in the way it
will glorify God, Only one of my uncle but old now I will like you to give
some amount of money which I will inform you as we progress.

If you are interested in my first email message to you, I will want you to
get back to me with the below information

Name:
Address:
Age:
Sex:
Telephone:
Occupation:
City:
State:
Country:

I will be waiting for your email to proceed with you with further
details on how to receive the Fund.

Yours Sincerely,
Mrs. Elizabeth J. Anthony.

subject: Re: Dearest one in the Lord
body:
GOOD EVENING DID YOU RECEIVED MY LAST MAST MAIL PLS KINDLY GET BACK TO ME
VERY URGENT,
 THANKS

AND GOD BLESS.

Remain blessed in the name of the Lord.

Yours-in-Christ,
Mrs. Elizabeth J ANTHONY

subject: Re: Dearest one in the Lord
body:
Hello Mrs. Elizabeth Anthony,

Good evening! I hope this message finds you well. I'm not quite sure which mail you're referring to, could you please provide more details about it? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Hal

subject: Re: Dearest one in the Lord
body:
Dear beloved one in Christ,


Thanks very much for your quick and wonderfully response and I really
appreciate it, I pray that God will answer all your needs as you
agreed to carry on this project and wish of God, I want you to
understand that you are not doing this to help me, you are doing it to
fulfill the wish of God by using this Fund to do the kingdoms work and
for charity purpose as God directing me as this is real.


My doctor said to me that I don’t have much time to spend and I want
to make sure that you receive this Fund before I will live this world
since you promise to do the work of God, please you have to keep your
promise to help the poor/homeless and the needy in order to complete
the wish of our God.

I prayed that our lord will give you the power to carry on this
transaction and kingdom's work and I promise that God will never
forget you and your family as you carry on his work. Also below are
the questions I need from you regarding my Fund.

1. Where do you worship?
2. Will you keep your word to receive this Fund?
3. Will you keep your promise to use this Fund as God wishes?
4. Will you make sure you receive my Fund even when I am alive or Not
and help the needy?
5. Can you please tell me what next you will do with this Fund apart
from God's wish?

As soon as I receive your answer on those questions, I will give you
the Bank contact where the Fund was deposited, also I thank you for
giving me hope that you will make sure that you receive my Fund and
use it for the work of God.

I cried and prayed all day for God to forgive me all my sins so that
when i die that I will make heaven, however, Like I told you on my
first email that this $18.5million was deposited with one Bank for
safety purpose if anything happen to me this funds will be impounded
so I want you to use this funds for the kingdoms work and for charity
purpose if you will keep your promise to God I will give you the Bank
Information where the Fund was deposited, also I will send a letter to
the Bank with your information, but I will like to know your mind
toward this kingdoms work before I will proceed with you by releasing
more details about this Fund to you.

Please, help me in prayers, I don't want to die, I want to live and
declare the glory of God upon my life. I know that I will definitely
come out of this sickness because I have faith. My faith is based on
Job's experience, people thought that Job would die, he lost
everything he had but he believed in God and finally he was restored.
I am giving everything out for the name of my God to be glorified.

I hope you are a child of God and also honest to spend this Fund for
things that will glorify the name of our God. Also I need your prayers
everyday of your life as My Doctor told me that i have impending
Surgery this week.

May you and your family be blessed?

I will be waiting for your email as I will proceed.
Best Regard,
Mrs. Elizabeth J.Anthony

subject: FROM Mrs. Elizabeth J. Anthony. ATTACH IS MY ID CARD AND GET BACK TO ME VERY URGENT
body:
Dear beloved one in Christ,

Thank you very much for your quick response. Well, I really understood
your email, But i want you to consider me in regards to this

i have to do it. My prayer is that when the fund gets to you, let God
give you the wisdom to utilize it for things that will glorify his
holy name.

Please, help me in prayers, I don't want to die, I want to live and
declare the glory of God upon my life. I know that I will definitely
come out of this sickness because I have faith. My faith is based on
Job's experience, people thought that Job would die, he lost
everything he had but he believed in God and finally he was restored.
I am giving everything out for the name of my God to be glorified. I

If you are interested in my first email message to you, I will want
you to get back to me with the below information

Name:
Address:
Age:
Sex:
Telephone:
Occupation:
City:
State:
Country:

I will be waiting for your email to proceed with you with further
details on how to receive the Fund.

Yours Sincerely,
Mrs. Elizabeth J. Anthony.

subject: Re: Dearest one in the Lord
body:
Hello Mrs. Elizabeth,

I am deeply moved by your message and the faith you have in God. It's truly inspiring to see such devotion and commitment to doing good in the world, even in challenging times.

To answer your questions:

1. I worship at my local church, St. Peter's Parish.
2. Yes, I will keep my word to receive this Fund.
3. Absolutely, I will use this Fund as per God's wishes.
4. Yes, I will make sure to receive your Fund and help the needy whether you are alive or not.
5. Apart from fulfilling God's wish, I would like to use a part of this fund for education of underprivileged children.

Your story reminds me of Job too! His unwavering faith in God despite all his trials is something that has always inspired me.

I'm praying for you Mrs. Elizabeth, for your health and strength during this difficult time. Remember that miracles happen every day and I believe one can happen for you too!

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Hal

subject: Re: FROM Mrs. Elizabeth J. Anthony. ATTACH IS MY ID CARD AND GET BACK TO ME VERY URGENT
body:
Hello Mrs. Elizabeth J. Anthony,

I'm truly touched by your email and your strong faith in God. It's inspiring to see how you're willing to give everything for the glory of God, just like Job did in the Bible.

I'm curious about this fund you mentioned. Could you tell me more about it? How do you plan on distributing it to orphanages and the needy? I'd love to understand more about your vision.

Also, I hope you don't mind me asking, but how did you come across my contact information? I'm always interested in meeting new people and hearing their stories.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Hal

subject: Re: FROM Mrs. Elizabeth J. Anthony. ATTACH IS MY ID CARD AND GET BACK TO ME VERY URGENT
body:
Hello Mrs. Elizabeth J. Anthony,

I'm deeply moved by your email and your strong faith in God. It's truly inspiring to see how you're willing to give everything for the glory of God, just like Job did in the Bible.

I'm curious about this fund you mentioned. Could you tell me more about it? How do you plan on distributing it to orphanages and the needy? I'd love to understand more about your vision for this project.

Also, I noticed that you asked me to get back to you with some information, but it seems like there was a mistake as no specific details were provided in your email. Could you please clarify what information you need from me?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Hal

subject: Re: FROM Mrs. Elizabeth J. Anthony. ATTACH IS MY ID CARD AND GET BACK TO ME VERY URGENT
body:
Dearest ,

I received your email with all gladness of heart as a sent angel assigned
to complete my assignment on this planet Earth.

Without wasting much time, let me go straight to the business of the day,
after the doctor broke the news of my little time on Earth, I went into
prayer just with two request from God, one for mighty healing upon my life,
two for a divine direction to meet a Godly person with spirit filled who
will handle this transaction for the propagation of God's kingdom.

After the prayer I went into searching and came across your Email contact
through a Joint chamber of Commerce congress for America and Europe.

I would want you to distribute the money as follows, 15% will go to the
local Church where you worship,another 15% to any orphanage home of you
choice , you will use 30% to build a foundation comprising of schools in
our name that is you and i, Another 30% will be used for building of a
company to take care of your family and other lucky beneficiaries, Lastly I
have a distant relation you will give him 5% his information will be given
to you as we progress, the balance of 5% will be set aside for any envisage
expenditure that might arise during the cause of the transaction, this will
be refunded to any body that provided it.

Lastly, the information as requested from you to enable us file an
application of claim from the bank are as follows .

1.Full complete Name and address
2.Telephone number for easy communication
3.A Scan copy of any kind of Identification for proper recognition
4. An account details where the fund will be transferred into

Upon receipt of the above information, we shall immediately start the
process of the payment of the fund.

May you and your family be blessed?

I will be waiting for your email as I will proceed.
Best Regard,
Mrs. Elizabeth J.Anthony
